import React from 'react' import Form from './Form' import NotesList from '../notes/NotesList' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useFirestoreConnect } from 'react-redux-firebase' const Home = () => { useFirestoreConnect([{collection:'notes',orderBy:['createdAt','desc']}]) const notes = useSelector((state) => state.firestore.ordered.notes) console.log(notes) return (
) } export default Home
